jobTitle: Full Stack Software Engineer, Chrome OS Health Monitoring
details:
Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience
Experience in one or more of the following programming languages: Java, C/C++, Go, Python, or JavaScript/TypeScript (e.g., Angular or React)

Qualifications:
       
7 years of experience in front-end engineering.
Experience with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Experience in web development, implementing user interfaces (UIs), or prototyping.

Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience in the field of computer science, with experience in data structures, algorithms, and software design.
Experience in C/C++ programming.

Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience
10 years of experience leading enterprise application portfolios and associated technologies (Openshift, Kubernetes, etc.)
5 years of experience in client-facing projects with cross-functional stakeholders
Experience architecting, deploying developing software, or internet scale production-grade cloud solutions in virtualized environments

Qualifications:
       
Bachelor’s degree, or equivalent practical experience.

5 years of experience with software development in one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, C, C++, Java, JavaScript).

3 years of experience in a technical leadership role; overseeing projects, with 2 years of experience in a people management, supervision/team leadership role.

jobTitle: Strategic Partner Development Manager, Google Play (Portuguese, English)
details:
Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience 
5 years of experience in business development, partnerships, sales, management consulting, investment banking, or operations at a technology or app developer company
Experience managing external partners at scale, working cross-functionally and managing contracts with legal
Ability to speak and write in English and Portuguese fluently

jobTitle: Manager, Core Partner Management, Google Play
details:
Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.

10 years of experiences in Apps and Games ecosystem.
2 years of experiences in people manager role.
Experience working in a scaled environment, planning and managing at a strategic and operational level.

Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a technical field, or equivalent practical experience
Experience with one or more general purpose programming languages (e.g., JavaScript, etc.)
Experience working with Angular 9

Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a technical field, or equivalent practical experience
Experience with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, Db2, etc.) test drive development, and front-end/back-end development (e.g., Angular, React, Spring, Java, REST API, etc.)
Ability to speak and write in English fluently

Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, similar technical degree, or equivalent practical experience
Experience working with product and engineering teams, driving cross-functional programs, and rolling out technology and solutions.
Experience with Open Source software.

Qualifications:
       
7 years of experience in front-end engineering.
Experience with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Experience in web development, implementing user interfaces (UIs), or prototyping.

Qualifications:
       
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience with Java and one or more general purpose programming languages (e.g., JavaScript, Python, etc.).
Experience with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, Db2, etc).
 Ability to speak and write fluently in English.

Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field or equivalent practical experience.
Experience with general purpose programming languages (e.g., Java, Javascript, etc.).
Experience working with Angular 9.

 Ability to speak and write in English fluently.

jobTitle: Head of Growth Engineering, Marketing Automation
details:
Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
10 years of experience in web application and services development.
Experience and in one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to: Go, Python, C++.

Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Math, a related quantitative field, or equivalent practical experience.
Software development experience in programming languages (e.g., Java, C/C++, C#, Objective C, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, or Go.)
Experience in web application development and business focused communication.

Qualifications:
       
3 years of experience in project management.
3 years of experience in operations.
Experience working in extended workforce operations.
Experience designing organizational systems and processes (e.g., onboarding, workflow, hiring, feedback, etc.).

jobTitle: Web Solutions Engineer, Google Cloud Support
details:
Qualifications:
       
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience in web application development and business focused communication.
Experience in coding using Java, C++, or Python.
Experience with JavaScript or Unix/Linux environments, relational/non-relational databases, API development (e.g., REST), or back-end/front-end system design.

Qualifications:
       
8 years of experience in front-end engineering and design.
3 years of experience in management.
Experience with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

jobTitle: Software Engineer, Chrome OS, Platform Health
details:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience in the field of computer science, with experience in data structures, algorithms, and software design.
Experience programming in one of the following: Java, C++, Go, Python, or TypeScript.

jobTitle: Web Solutions Engineer, Global Sales Tools Engineering
details:
Qualifications:
       
Experience in application-level vulnerability testing, code-level security auditing, or building/reverse engineering JavaScript mobile or web applications
Experience with API design and service layer architectures
Experience in programming languages (e.g., Java, C/C++, Go, Python, or Javascript/TypeScript (e.g. Angular or React)).
